localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.title:
It's official.

$83.7 billion in SPAC IPOs so far this year, a new record.

And it's only March 16. https://t.co/f3pnNGn8Lx
blogPost.author: Charlie Bilello

localize.full_text:
这是官方的。

今年以来SPAC上市金额837亿美元，创下新纪录。

而现在才3月16日，https://t.co/f3pnNGn8Lx。

這是官方的。

今年以來SPAC上市金額837億美元，創下新紀錄。

而現在才3月16日，https://t.co/f3pnNGn8Lx。

previous.excerpt: Stop interrupting with @channel! Usually anyone can answer so why do we keep distracting everyone? Tellspin makes it easy to create schedules / escalation policies for Slack. Share the load with your team members with built-in user groups/@mentions.

localize.description: 别再用@channel打岔了! 通常任何人都可以回答，为什么我们要一直分散大家的注意力？Tellspin让你轻松为Slack创建日程/升级策略。通过内置的用户组/@mentions与你的团队成员分担负荷。
